title: 4M BUILDING SOLUTIONS
contents:
The Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) was designed to provide a direct incentive for small businesses to keep their workers on the payroll. It ended in August 2020, but a new PPP bill is being considered.
As part of the Paycheck Protection Program 4M BUILDING SOLUTIONS, INC received a loan.
4M BUILDING SOLUTIONS, INC






Loan Amount


10000000


BusinessName


4M BUILDING SOLUTIONS, INC


Address


2827 Clark Avenue


City


SAINT LOUIS


State


MO


Zip


63103


NAICSCode


561720


BusinessType


Subchapter S Corporation


RaceEthnicity


Unanswered


Gender


Unanswered


Veteran


Unanswered


NonProfit




JobsReported


0


DateApproved


06/24/2020


Lender


UMB Bank, National Association


CD


MO-01


BusinessName.clean


4M BUILDING SOLUTIONS


Data Sources
The data come from a release of over 5,000,000 records by the SBA in November, 2020.
Who Could Apply?
The following entities affected by Coronavirus (COVID-19) may have been eligible:
Any small business concern that meets SBA’s size standards (either the industry based sized standard or the alternative size standard)
Sole proprietors, independent contractors, and self-employed persons
Any business with a NAICS Code that begins with 72 (Accommodations and Food Services) that has more than one physical location and employs less than 500 per location
Any business, 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, 501(c)(19) veterans organization, or Tribal business concern (sec. 31(b)(2)(C) of the Small Business Act) with the greater of:
500 employees, or
That meets the SBA industry size standard if more than 500

More info about the PPP is available from the Small Business Administration.
Other companies that received a PPP loan

title: Welcome to Paycheck Protection Program
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Paycheck Protection Program. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
